title: Bitcoin on the cusp of historic 9th consecutive week of gains
description:
Quick Take Bitcoin has recently recorded eight consecutive weeks of gains from Oct 16 to Dec 4, a phenomenon that has only happened six times in the past. Streak Start Date Streak End Date 2010-12-06 2011-01-24 2012-05-14 2012-07-02 2013-01-07 2013-02-25 2013-10-07 2013-11-25 2015-09-14 2015-11-02 2017-04-17 2017-06-05 2023-10-16 2023-12-04 Source: Glassnode Current figures depict a slight […]

The post Bitcoin on the cusp of historic 9th consecutive week of gains appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: JPMorgan isn’t so bullish on crypto for next year – Why?
description: In the world of cryptocurrencies, the anticipation of market trends is akin to forecasting the weather in an alternate universe. title: Here’s how DeFi users can predict future returns with crypto bonds
description: The digital bonds hold the potential for significant advancement and contribute to the ongoing maturation of the cryptocurrency ecosystem.   The Time Value of Money (TVM) depends on the concept of a dollar today being worth more than a dollar in the future. The idea is that money changes over time due to interest, inflation, [...]

title: Ex-Credit Suisse Executive Launches Crypto Trading Platform for Banks
description:
David Riegelnig, a former Credit Suisse AG private banking executive, has launched a cryptocurrency trading platform aimed at banks and securities firms, Bloomberg reported Thursday. The report stated the move is a strategic effort to capitalize on the increasing interest in digital assets from traditional financial institutions outside the United States.  Indeed, Riegelnig, in 2015, […]

The post Ex-Credit Suisse Executive Launches Crypto Trading Platform for Banks appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: KuCoin Forced To Exit New York After Settling State Attorney General’s Lawsuit for $22,000,000
description:
Crypto exchange KuCoin will cease operating in New York as part of an agreement to settle a lawsuit accusing the Seychelles-based platform of failing to register as a securities and commodities broker-dealer. In a new statement, the office of New York Attorney General Letitia James says KuCoin must pay the state a $5.3 million penalty […]

The post KuCoin Forced To Exit New York After Settling State Attorney General’s Lawsuit for $22,000,000 appeared first on The Daily Hodl.

title: Ledger Hardware Wallet Announces Critical Security Vulnerability, Urges Users To Pause Interacting With DApps
description:
Crypto firm Ledger is warning users about a crucial exploit, urging them to pause their hardware wallet interactions with decentralized applications (DApps). In a new thread on the social media platform X, Ledger says that it has found, identified, and replaced a malicious version of its connect kit, a piece of code used to connect […]

The post Ledger Hardware Wallet Announces Critical Security Vulnerability, Urges Users To Pause Interacting With DApps appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
